name: George Romero in Zombie Squash Game
blurb: Stop a horde of Zombie Squash from taking over the world.The Godfather of All Zombies, George Romero voices the villain.

rewards.reward: You have our sincere thanks and a special Zombie Squash Backer wallpaper.
The FULL LENGTH ZOMBIE SQUASH SOUNDTRACK MP3 ALBUM produced by Roy Z, and special Zombie Squash Backer wallpaper.
A FULL DRM-Free version of the game for MAC or PC, an MP3 download of the Zombie Squash theme song, special Zombie Squash Backer wallpaper.

A FULL DRM-Free version of the game for MAC or PC and choice of iOS or Android, the full length Zombie Squash soundtrack MP3 ALBUM produced by Roy Z, and special Zombie Squash Backer wallpaper.
